website_summaries.verdict: The Samba Super, one of the best Adidas shoes ever created, receives a new touch of premium suede on the upper. The retro look is completed with a large Trefoil branding on the prominent tongue, Three Stripes branding on the sides, iconic rubber toe cap, and grippy rubber outsole. Consumers who attest to its comfort also like that it is stylish enough to wear with almost anything. Although considered an excellent shoe for a great price, most purchasers find that it fits narrow in the toe box.
pros: The Adidas Samba Super Suede is a comfortable pair of classics, most purchasers report
Many reviewers note that this is as stylish as the original Samba Super
A large number of reviewers appreciate the superb quality of this shoe that lasts for years
Some purchasers are delighted to get this shoe at a reasonable price
A few reviewers recommend this shoe
Some purchasers comment that the color is true to the advertised photo online
One reviewer notes that the suede material on the upper seems to be better than the previous Samba pairs he bought years ago
A few purchasers note that this is lightweight
Many commenters state that this shoe is very easy to wear and goes well with almost anything
cons: The Adidas Samba Super Suede is a little narrow in the toebox, according to the majority of purchasers
A limited number of reviewers report that the heel part rubs on their skin
Some disappointed purchasers mention that the logo and the text on the tongue wore off quickly
One reviewer states that the shoelaces are short

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Was unsure about theres at first but worn them in and they very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: johnny mc carthy

customer_reviews.title: A size too small
customer_reviews.text: Love these retro trainers, Adidas trainers are renowned for coming up small, I’m a size 9 usually but ordered a 9.5 but still a bit small but I can just about get away with it. If I could be bother I’d send back and get a 10 !!!
customer_reviews.author: paul j malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Awaiting refund of one pair other pair great
customer_reviews.text: This pair right size at last last pair 12 I needed 7😱
customer_reviews.author: Glynis Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting a darker blue but still a nice shoe. Ordered a half size larger than usual ...
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting a darker blue but still a nice shoe. Ordered a half size larger than usual and are a really good fit
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: He wore the previous pair for good 2-2. 5 years and he loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pair of shoes for my husband and they were actually a replacement. He wore the previous pair for good 2-2.5 years and he loved it. The shoes are a great fit for his feet, reasonably priced, well made and very comfortable. Certainly recommend:)
customer_reviews.author: Beatrix

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Err ordered the blue suede and got black leather??? Great, now I get to waste time returning them :-(
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Nice, comfortable and fresh
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes... they have a 2000s feeling, look good and no less important they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pierpaolo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My hubby love's them got them for chrismas on time to
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Old School Trainer's
customer_reviews.text: These are great old school trainer's & the price they come for is great aswell. I would recomend if you have a wide fitting foot i would get the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Nps

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my birthday presents ive had no complaints off of him allthough im sick of tripping up over them
customer_reviews.author: JayNine87

customer_reviews.title: Samba shoe size
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 9. I bought 9 1/2 as when I was given a pair of Samba several years ago they were tight. I wore my new trainers Friday evening & whilst out they started rubbing my heel. I bought a pair of Adidas Gazelle about a year ago size 9 1/2 with no problems,
customer_reviews.author: Steve Forrester

customer_reviews.title: Small size adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected. Allow a half size bigger than your ‘normal’ shoe size, for an accurate fit.
customer_reviews.author: mr c j frost

customer_reviews.title: dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm not happy with these trainers for what I payed. These were for my son there comfy to wear but all the adidas pattern on the trainers are coming off and he's only had them a week.
customer_reviews.author: june noble

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted these despite them being men's. She loves them & all her friends have admired them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just put my new trainers on today and they feel.comftable.
customer_reviews.author: mr g a holland

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my Sambas wish i had of gone half a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these trainers, will be buying from this seller again for sure 😊
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality. Dispatched Quickly. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great colour, great quality and my son absolutely loves them - in fact, he will not take them off!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs V Hanka

customer_reviews.title: Terrible and low quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Broke very quickly, customer service didn't respond to multiple attempts to contact them. Terrible do not use!!
customer_reviews.author: Harry Lee

product_meta.title: adidas Samba Super Suede, Men’s Trainers
product_meta.description: Lightweight, run inspired shoe with a sporty appearance. Featuring synthetic Suede overlays and a mesh upper, This allows for enhanced breathability. Official Merchandise.
